flawed_nl_solution:
Excluding Clarissa, there are 7 + 10 + 9 = <<7+10+9=21>>21 photos.
Clarissa needs to bring 40 - 21 = <<40-21=19>>19 photos to complete the photo album.
#### 19

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 26, not 21. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
